reviewText: This is an excellent DVD that makes building an O gauge model railroa much easier. I would highly recommend this to the beginner or intermediate model railroader.
A must for Lionel trains lovers! If you plan to build one this video will help you with many good ideas.

Trying to recapture a part of your youth? I admit that I am by building a model O Gauge 3-rail railroad like I had when I was a kid. I am using Lionel's "FasTrack" and I was looking for a video that showed some FasTrack layouts with scenery suggestions and "how to tips". Well this video fills the bill! It's expertly done and details exactly how to use Lionel FasTrack and Woodland Scenic Products to build a realistic model O gauge railroad that's fun and easy to do. I hadn't built a model railroad in over 40 years, so my wiring skills were rusty, but this video leads you through it very skillfully.

A picture may be worth a thousand words...but this video is one you'll refer to time & time again! Each time you view it, you'll find another tip that you'll want to incorporate into your own layout. It's a must have for the model railroader !
This video Presents good, clear information for a first time builder. Well organized presentation. Worth the money. I recommend it.
Some useful advise but dated video and content
Good for all train loving kids.
I found this book to be informative and useful.
Generic, but does lay foundation for new model trainers.  Structure of delivery and better description as to what needs to be accomplished is needed
